This comedy follows a small-town sheriff who finds himself in a series of hilarious misadventures when he witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping. The film stars Larry the Cable Guy and Jenny McCarthy.

If you're interested in a more dramatic police story, "Man on Fire" might appeal to you. This film features Denzel Washington as a retired assassin who becomes the protector of a young girl in Mexico City. It delves into themes of vengeance and redemption.

Angelina Jolie Pitt delivers a powerful performance as Maleficent in this enchanting tale.

If you're interested in exploring more action and adventure, "The Legend of Zorro" might also appeal to you. Set in California during its pursuit of statehood, the story revolves around the swashbuckling Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, as they take action against a threatening force. Antonio Banderas plays Don Alejandro with charm and charisma that make this movie an entertaining watch!

This film tells an engrossing story about U.S President Abraham Lincoln and his decision to emancipate the slaves during the Civil War. Joseph Gordon-Levitt gives a particularly noteworthy performance in this moving tale.
